1 sign
8 exponent
23 mantissa

101

seeeeeeeemmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmm
         1.mmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmm
 00000000

number = s * 2 to (expon - 128) * m
         1 x 2 ^ -128 = 0

0 01111111 = 127
  1.mmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmm
   .00000000000000000000000
0 10000000 1.mmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmm
   .00000000000000000000000

comparing 1.0 to 2.0

0 01111111   000000000000000000000000
0 10000000   000000000000000000000000
